product_name: REI Grand Tour 80 Travel Pack - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Pairing incredible volume with great comfort for the long haul, this 80-liter travel pack has an adjustable women-specific suspension, a removable daypack and lots of pockets.
short_description: Pairing incredible volume with great comfort for the long haul, this 80-liter travel pack has an adjustable women-specific suspension, a removable daypack and lots of pockets.
